Serialized Form

  • Package jsymbolic2.gui

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.ExtractionConfigurationsPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • outer_frame

          OuterFrame outer_frame
          Holds a reference to the JFrame that holds this ExtractionConfigurationsPanel object.

        • window_length_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea window_length_text_area
          A text are where the user can indicate the duration of each window to use during windowed feature extraction.

        • window_overlap_fraction_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea window_overlap_fraction_text_area
          A text are where the user can indicate the window overlap fraction to use during windowed feature extraction.

        • feature_values_save_path_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea feature_values_save_path_text_area
          A text area where the user can indicate the path to which feature values are to be saved in the form of an ACE XML feature values file after feature extraction is complete.

        • feature_definitions_save_path_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea feature_definitions_save_path_text_area
          A text area where the user can indicate the path to which feature metadata is to be saved in the form of an ACE XML feature definitions file after feature extraction is complete.

        • save_overall_features_only_radio_button

          javax.swing.JRadioButton save_overall_features_only_radio_button
          A radio button indicating that features are to be saved for each file as a whole (i.e. not for individual windows).

        • save_windowed_features_only_radio_button

          javax.swing.JRadioButton save_windowed_features_only_radio_button
          A radio button indicating that input files are to be subdivided into windows, and that features are to be extracted from each window individually (and not for files as a whole).

        • save_as_weka_arff_check_box

          javax.swing.JCheckBox save_as_weka_arff_check_box
          A check box indicating whether extracted feature values are to be saved as Weka ARFF files (as well as ACE XML files).

        • save_as_csv_check_box

          javax.swing.JCheckBox save_as_csv_check_box
          A check box indicating whether extracted feature values are to be saved as CSV files (as well as ACE XML files).

        • load_configuration_file_button

          javax.swing.JButton load_configuration_file_button
          A button that brings up a dialog box allowing the user to select the path to load a new configuration file from.

        • save_configuration_file_button

          javax.swing.JButton save_configuration_file_button
          A button that brings up a dialog box allowing the user to select the path to save new configuration files to.

        • feature_values_save_path_button

          javax.swing.JButton feature_values_save_path_button
          A button that brings up a dialog box allowing the user to select the path to which feature values are to be saved (in the form of an ACE XML feature values file) after feature extraction is complete.

        • feature_definitions_save_path_button

          javax.swing.JButton feature_definitions_save_path_button
          A button that brings up a dialog box allowing the user to select the path to which feature metadata is to be saved (in the form of an ACE XML feature definitions file) after feature extraction is complete.

        • extract_features_button

          javax.swing.JButton extract_features_button
          A button initiating feature extraction and saving.

        • load_file_chooser

          javax.swing.JFileChooser load_file_chooser
          A dialog box allowing the user to choose paths for loading various types of files.

        • save_file_chooser

          javax.swing.JFileChooser save_file_chooser
          A dialog box allowing the user to choose paths for saving various types of files.

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.FeatureSelectorPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • outer_frame

          OuterFrame outer_frame
          Holds a reference to the JFrame that holds this FeatureSelectionPanel object.

        • all_feature_extractors

          MIDIFeatureExtractor[] all_feature_extractors
          Hold one instance of each implemented feature.

        • feature_save_defaults

          boolean[] feature_save_defaults
          The default features to save during feature extraction. Ordering matches those of the features in the all_feature_extractors field.

        • features_table

          javax.swing.JTable features_table
          A table where each row corresponds to a different feature, and each implemented feature is listed exactly once. The first column holds a check box indicating whether that row's feature should be saved during feature extraction. The other columns hold metadata about the given row's feature.

        • features_table_model

          FeatureSelectorTableModel features_table_model
          The table model for the features_table field.

        • select_default_features_button

          javax.swing.JButton select_default_features_button
          A button causing the default features to be marked for extraction on the features_table.

        • select_all_features_button

          javax.swing.JButton select_all_features_button
          A button causing the all features to be marked for extraction on the features_table.

        • deselect_all_features_button

          javax.swing.JButton deselect_all_features_button
          A button causing no features to be marked for extraction on the features_table.

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.FeatureSelectorTableModel extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel implements Serializable

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.MusicFileSelectorPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • outer_frame

          OuterFrame outer_frame
          Holds a reference to the JFrame that holds this MusicFileSelectorPanel object.

        • symbolic_music_files_table

          javax.swing.JTable symbolic_music_files_table
          The table holding symbolic music files from which features will eventually be extracted.

        • symbolic_music_files_table_model

          SymbolicMusicFilesTableModel symbolic_music_files_table_model
          The table model for symbolic_music_files_table.

        • add_files_button

          javax.swing.JButton add_files_button
          A button for adding symbolic music files to the the table of files from which features will eventually be extracted. Brings up a file chooser dialog box for doing so. An error message will be displayed if invalid or nonexistent files are chosen. Files chosen that are already on the table will be ignored. If any files are selected, then a report will be written to the Processing Information text area.

        • add_directory_button

          javax.swing.JButton add_directory_button
          A button for adding symbolic music files to the the table of files from which features will eventually be extracted. Brings up a file chooser dialog box that allows the user to choose one (and only one) directory, whose contents are added to the symbolic_music_files_table list of references of symbolic music files. Any files that do not have a file extension associated with a compatible symbolic music file are filtered out from consideration. Sub-directories are also explored, recursively. If an entered path corresponds to a directory that does not exist, or that contains an invalid symbolic music file, then an error message dialog box is displayed. Files chosen that are already on the table will be ignored. Prints a report to the Processing Information text area.

        • get_consistency_reports_button

          javax.swing.JButton get_consistency_reports_button
          A button for displaying consistency reports. Brings up a new text window holding a formatted consistency report on those symbolic music files that the user has selected on the symbolic_music_files_table table (i.e. the particular ones that are selected, not necessarily all of the ones that appear on the table). This report begins by providing, for each file separately, an intraconsistenccy report that indicates whether the given file has more than one value for a range of quantities (e.g. more than one tempo, more than one meter, etc.). Then, if more than one file has been selected by the user, an interconsistency is provided that indicates, for all files considered as a whole, whether all the files share the same value or set of values for each of the quantities being tested for (e.g. all the files have the same tempo, or the same set of tempos).

        • see_midi_messages_button

          javax.swing.JButton see_midi_messages_button
          A button for displaying MIDI dump reports. Brings up a new text window holding a report on those symbolic music files that the user has selected on the symbolic_music_files_table table (i.e. the particular ones that are selected, not necessarily all of the ones that appear on the table). This report indicates, separately for each file selected by the user, a structured transcription of all the relevant MIDI messages that the given file contains. If a given file is an MEI file rather than a MIDI file, then it is converted to MIDI before the report on it is generated.

        • remove_files_button

          javax.swing.JButton remove_files_button
          Removes any files selected on the table from the table.

        • sonify_file_directly_button

          javax.swing.JButton sonify_file_directly_button
          Plays the selected symbolic music file. Converts it to MIDI if it is not already MIDI.

        • stop_sonification_button

          javax.swing.JButton stop_sonification_button
          Stops any currently ongoing playback of symbolic music files.

        • load_symbolic_music_file_chooser

          javax.swing.JFileChooser load_symbolic_music_file_chooser
          Allows the user to choose one or more symbolic music files to load.

        • load_symbolic_music_in_a_directory_chooser

          javax.swing.JFileChooser load_symbolic_music_in_a_directory_chooser
          Allows the user to a directory from which all symbolic music files with qualifying file extensions will be loaded. Sub-directories are explored recursively.

        • midi_sequencer

          javax.sound.midi.Sequencer midi_sequencer
          For synthesizing MIDI streams.

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.OuterFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • music_file_selector_panel

          MusicFileSelectorPanel music_file_selector_panel
          A panel listing the symbolic files from which features are to be extracted. The user may add files to this list, delete files from it, view information about the files or play the files.

        • feature_selector_panel

          FeatureSelectorPanel feature_selector_panel
          A panel allowing the user to select the features to be extracted and to see information about each feature.

        • extraction_configurations_panel

          ExtractionConfigurationsPanel extraction_configurations_panel
          A panel allowing the user to specify all feature extraction and configuration file settings other than the particular symbolic files from which features are to be extracted (this is set in the MusicFileSelectorPanel) and the particular features that are to be extracted and saved from them (this is set in the FeatureSelectorPanel). The user may use buttons on this panel to initiate feature extraction and saving, to save the settings currently entered on the GUI in a configuration file, or to load settings from an existing configuration file.

        • status_print_stream

          java.io.PrintStream status_print_stream
          The stream to which processing status updates are written to.

        • error_print_stream

          java.io.PrintStream error_print_stream
          The stream to which errors are written to.

        • status_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea status_text_area
          Where processing status messages are displayed.

        • error_text_area

          javax.swing.JTextArea error_text_area
          Where error messages are displayed during processing.

        • about_menu_item

          javax.swing.JMenuItem about_menu_item
          Displays ownership and version information.

        • help_menu_item

          javax.swing.JMenuItem help_menu_item
          Makes the help_dialog visible.

        • tutorial_menu_item

          javax.swing.JMenuItem tutorial_menu_item
          Makes the tutorial_dialog visible.

        • help_dialog

          mckay.utilities.gui.templates.HelpDialog help_dialog
          Displays the on-line manual.

        • tutorial_dialog

          mckay.utilities.gui.templates.HelpDialog tutorial_dialog
          Displays the on-line tutorial.

    • Class jsymbolic2.gui.SymbolicMusicFilesTableModel extends javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel implements Serializable
